title: Vertical farming with collard greens on an aeroponic tower #collardgreens

subtasks: Identify collard greens in the field.
Clean collard greens by removing dirt and debris.
Possibly trim collard greens if needed.
Place harvested collard greens in a container.
Refrigerate collard greens to maintain freshness.
